name: ChocoSpace
description:
Space station building, resource management game. Build routes and deliver chocolate for hungry colonists.

Controls: Mouse

Middle mouse button to move camera, scroll to zoom

Right mouse deletes routes and building stations

Made in 72 hours for LÖVE Jam 2021 by saviorium and sawa9889

Source code

Libraries used:

LÖVE 11.3
hump - for classes, gamestates, vectors
peachy - for animations
